sections.pali: ‘‘Pabhassaravaravaṇṇanibhe, surattavatthavasane [vatthanivāsane (sī. syā.)]; Mahiddhike candanaruciragatte, kā tvaṃ subhe devate vandase mamaṃ.
‘‘Pallaṅko ca te mahaggho, nānāratanacittito ruciro; Yattha tvaṃ nisinnā virocasi, devarājāriva nandane vane.
‘‘Kiṃ tvaṃ pure sucaritamācarī bhadde, kissa kammassa vipākaṃ; Anubhosi devalokasmiṃ, devate pucchitācikkha; Kissa kammassidaṃ phala’’nti.
‘‘Piṇḍāya te carantassa, mālaṃ phāṇitañca adadaṃ bhante; Tassa kammassidaṃ vipākaṃ, anubhomi devalokasmiṃ.
‘‘Hoti ca me anutāpo, aparaddhaṃ [aparādhaṃ (syā.)] dukkhitañca [dukkaṭañca (sī.)] me bhante; Sāhaṃ dhammaṃ nāssosiṃ, sudesitaṃ dhammarājena.
‘‘Taṃ taṃ vadāmi bhaddante, ‘yassa me anukampiyo koci; Dhammesu taṃ samādapetha’, sudesitaṃ dhammarājena.
‘‘Yesaṃ atthi saddhā buddhe, dhamme ca saṅgharatane; Te maṃ ativirocanti, āyunā yasasā siriyā.
‘‘Patāpena vaṇṇena uttaritarā, Aññe mahiddhikatarā mayā devā’’ti; Pabhassaravimānaṃ dutiyaṃ.
